Summary: Bright light in SW over golf course
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Goldthwaite
There were no other sightings in Goldthwaite on or around February 1st 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI saw a bright light over the golf course around 7pm that had not been there before. Again at 10pm, the light had moved closer to directly overhead. There was no sound.There was a triangle shape around the object light with many different colors coming from it. Many bright blue lights twinkled around it also.
